greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of A000005 required to reach 2 when started at n!.
example: For n=108, a(108)=9 because the sequence of iterates is {108!,798687560466432000,7920,60,12,6,4,3,2}, length=9.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 24 2000
